ReviewContent: Have used this brand for a number of years and have found melatonin a good sleep aid.  This product is well priced and  easy to take.  Why the 3?  Have found the active level to be very inconsistent from bottle to bottle.  Have also found as has been well documented that taking to much can have side effects such as dizziness at night.  Be conscious of this with this product and adjust accordingly.  With the current 1 mg bottles I have, I actually split one  in two

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: Yes they are chewable and the flavor isn't that bad but if you really want something to help you sleep, don't get the 1mg or even the 5mg bottle, I suggest you go for 10mg+ if you're having trouble to sleep. I take one or even 2 30min before going to sleep (around 9pm), I fall asleep but late at night I keep rolling in my bed and my conscious is working.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: Bought this to see if melatonin would work on me; it doesn't seem to make a difference at the lowest mg.  May need to up the dose to be able to actually tell if it helps.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: Not bad but wanted something stronger, went to a 12mg and sleep like a baby

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I like this product but I only got 30 pills, not 90. I would order it again if I knew it would be the full amount that I paid for.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: If you're trying it for the first time (or the first time in many years), I would plan around potentially being totally knocked out on the couch the next day.  I didn't realize how bad the side effects can be and was pretty surprised by just how lousy this small dose made me feel.I've been having a lot of trouble sleeping during the pandemic and tried meditation apps, sleepytime tea, an eye mask, soothing music, etc. without success, so I decided it was worth trying melatonin again.  I took it years ago without it having much effect on me (good or bad), so I figured the worst outcome would be that it did nothing. So I was pretty surprised when the melatonin made me extremely drowsy shortly after taking it.  The going to sleep part worked pretty well.  But getting restful sleep?  Not so much!I had very weird, very intense dreams and despite sleeping for 9.5 hours (!) woke up feeling worse than I do after a lousy night's sleep.  Basically, it was like being spectacularly hungover (although fortunately without the other symptoms besides exhaustion and fuzzy-headedness).  I was running a huge sleep deficit though, so when I googled it and learned some people do adjust to melatonin and stop having side effects, it seemed worth tweaking the timing, planning for a long night's sleep, and trying again.  But it just got worse.  By night 3, I ended up going back to bed and sleeping through most of the next day.  I gave up at that point.I have no idea why I'm so sensitive to it now, but I definitely can't take this dose.  I'm reluctant to try again with a lower dose, as this was really pretty unpleasant.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: This product worked for me on the first day ONLY! The flavor is very yummy, I must say.  It is easy to dissolve when you stuck on it.After day 1, no matter what I did it never put me to sleep again ‍♀️And oh, before I forget, it gave me a really bad nightmare the first few times I took it. Most especially the first night.Lastly, I did not stay sleeping for over 5 hours on that first night.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: Product arrived with no safety seal around cap, the safety seal under the cap practically fell off and there was no cotton packing in the container preventing the tablets from getting smashed or powdery from shaking in transit.Have ordered this product before without issue and it worked great.Amazon claims this can be refunded or replaced but refused to do it online or via chat.  Had to call to talk with a person and get it refunded.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: Daughter didn’t like the taste of this brand. She likes other chewable melatonin but this one she will not take.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I've taken one pill per evening, for three evenings. Dissolved under tongue.Results: I stopped taking melatonin.Problems: Alarming spiking heart rate for about five minutes, within hour of ingesting. It went back down, but not to normal levels. My HR during sleep was slightly elevated as well.My pulse ox monitor showed reduced oxygen levels during sleep, into sub-optimal levels.If you google diligently, you will find both side-effects are listed for melatonin use in certain individuals.Melatonin is a hormone, and it is not harmful.In many patients, it's well tolerated. In many others, it can cause harms. And that's with only ONE mg.
ReviewTitle: Fast Dissolve Tablets 1mg - spiked heart rate and lowered oxygen levels during sleep

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: The pills don’t have a consistent 1 mg effect. Other options are better.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: It puts me to sleep within 20 minutes, however I always seem to wake up 4-5 hours after taking this tablet. I figured I’ll double the dosage (2 tablets now) and see if I wake up a few hours later. Negative. I sleep all night long. My full 8 hours I’m used to... BUT.... their IS A BUT !! I find myself waking up with a FAT headache that eventually goes away after taking 2 Tylenol  pills (Yikes) so many pills can’t possibly be good for this liver!! I’ll just stick with the 1 Mila gram but for KIDS I prefer it over this one. No waking up in the middle of the night and no headache. I’m not sure but it could be just the brand. I don’t know.
ReviewTitle: Restless nights/ headache the next morning

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: Took these a few nights. First night, kept me awake. 2nd night, went to sleep, but woke up about 3 hours later. This trend continued for the week I took them. No longer using them.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I got this for my daughter she is 9 about 106 lbs and 5’0 most of the time she can’t sleep . Started with one it worked pretty quick . I also took one because sometimes I can’t sleep the next morning I was so irritated didn’t want to be bother and very annoyed. My daughter seemed rested. Today is the second night I gave it to her and she was hearing voices telling her to look at them. Wouldn’t recommend.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I didn't look at the ingredients before buying,  because I've bought this product (which had better AND less ingredients) several times and trusted that the ingredients would be the same or at least similar. There's soy and a few other questionables in the ingredients list on this one, which is way different. Weird. Won't buy again.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I took one of these and it dissolved under my tongue. A few minutes later I felt very nauseous. The nausea did not go away. My husband also took one and it made him nauseous too. After a while we were both able to sleep and I felt that I slept fairly well, much better than I normally do. That is why I am giving this more than one star. It would of been perfect if it didn't make both of us completely nauseous. I wish this would of worked for us, the reason I bought it was because my mom told me about it and said it had really improved her sleeping! So I wanted to give it a try!
ReviewTitle: much better than I normally do

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: Very frustrated to note that this tablet contains wheat. Of course I'd fed several to my celiac daughter before I noticed. ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: If you're trying it for the first time (or the first time in many years), I would plan around potentially being totally knocked out on the couch the next day.  I didn't realize how bad the side effects can be and was pretty surprised by just how lousy this small dose made me feel.I've been having a lot of trouble sleeping during the pandemic and tried meditation apps, sleepytime tea, an eye mask, soothing music, etc. without success, so I decided it was worth trying melatonin again.  I took it years ago without it having much effect on me (good or bad), so I figured the worst outcome would be that it did nothing. So I was pretty surprised when the melatonin made me extremely drowsy shortly after taking it.  The going to sleep part worked pretty well.  But getting restful sleep?  Not so much!I had very weird, very intense dreams and despite sleeping for 9.5 hours (!) woke up feeling worse than I do after a lousy night's sleep.  Basically, it was like being spectacularly hungover (although fortunately without the other symptoms besides exhaustion and fuzzy-headedness).  I was running a huge sleep deficit though, so when I googled it and learned some people do adjust to melatonin and stop having side effects, it seemed worth tweaking the timing, planning for a long night's sleep, and trying again.  But it just got worse.  By night 3, I ended up going back to bed and sleeping through most of the next day.  I gave up at that point.I have no idea why I'm so sensitive to it now, but I definitely can't take this dose.  I'm reluctant to try again with a lower dose, as this was really pretty unpleasant.

ReviewContent: I have used this for quite some time and really like it, but dropped one on the floor and my dog almost got it. I looked up melatonin and was assured that is not toxic but then noticed this has xylitol which is toxic to dogs. I ban ALL xylitol products from my home, so this will have to go. I don’t even know why Natrol would use something so tonic to dogs. Thumbs down.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: We accepted these as a substitute for the children’s 1mg dissolvable berry melatonin, but they are not nearly as palatable. I hope we can go back to the children’s version.
ReviewTitle: Not tasty. Try the kids dissolvable 1mg instead.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: These worked great for me for sleep... BUT they have dextrose, which is sugar, in them. I just got back from the dentist and I have 3 serious cavities which need fillings sooner rather than later, as well as 2 less-urgent cavities that maybe I can reverse with expensive toothpaste. I take *meticulous* care of my teeth and have a healthy diet and have only ever had a cavity here or there in my nearly fifty years of going to the dentist.Why they would put sugar into a product you're going to take right before you go to bed, so that the sugar has time to sit and dissolve upon your teeth, makes no rational sense to me, and I'm angry about it. My fault, I guess, for not reading the ingredient list, but honestly I don't know if I would have twigged to "dextrose" as another name for sugar if some other reviewer on here hadn't pointed it out. So kudos and thanks to that person.My dentist said this theory made sense in looking at my teeth since the only surfaces that showed decay were the back bottom teeth and only on the tops of those teeth - consistent with something you're going to dissolve in your mouth and let sit.So if I can warn someone else away before they ruin THEIR teeth, I figure I'm doing my good deed for the day. Thank you for reading. /rant
ReviewTitle: These have dextrose in them & will ruin your teeth

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: New melatonin 1 mg is not as an effective as the ones that dissolved in your mouth.With new melatonin, I have to take three1 mg for it to be effective.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I've been getting this though Amazon for many years and it doesn't have any effect anymore; my insomnia is total. Unfortunately have to take pharma now.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I initially purchased the 1 mg and the 3 mg versions of this product. Both versions contain 10 mg of B6.I first tried the 1 mg for two nights and my insomnia got worse!?!? I suspected it might be the B6 because I know that B vitamins in general can be energizing for the brain - so the next night I took 1/4 of a 3 mg pill instead, which gave me 0.75 mg of melatonin and reduced the B6 to only 2.5 mg vs the original 10 mg.That night I did much better - it was definitely the B6 - but I also woke up with a groggy feeling like I had a ‘melatonin hangover’ - as if I had been drugged or something,In the end I gave up on melatonin and began practicing strict sleep hygiene which consisted of:Not using my iphone after 7 PMDoing my treadmill an hour earlier (at 7 PM vs 8 PM)Eating a smaller dinner earlierDimming the lights in my house during the eveningTurning the brightness down on my TV and watching non-stimulating shows at nightGoing to bed and waking up in the morning at the same time each day to help reset my internal clock (bed at 10 PM and wake at 6 AM)While my sleep is not perfect it is 80% better after taking these measures - without any pills!
ReviewTitle: CAUTION: THE B6 IN THIS MIGHT KEEP YOU AWAKE!!!!

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I see that this is recommended for adults yet many of the reviews say they give it to their children to help them sleep. The product tastes great and a 1 mg, one pill might work on a child, but it is not effective for me. I was using a different product, a fermented, liquid melatonin of 8 mg per dropper, and obviously I need more than 1 mg for it to be effective, because the liquid worked much better than this. So 200 pills is more like a month’s supply for me.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: Melatonin usually will put me to sleep if I don't take it too often. I spent a good bit of time going through the choices and liked the price and reviews for this. Last night I took 2, as I most always have in the past. It didn't affect me in ANY way and I didn't get to sleep. Today I looked at the bottle again, wondering if I should try staying awake the rest of the day and taking 3 tonight and finally saw "1 mg"! Why would anyone want ONE milligram? Maybe this is for babies or very young children, but I can't imagine them needing melatonin... TEN Mgs is the dose I've always taken or 12 if the pills are just 3 mgs each. The "1 mg" is in light green on dark purple and is almost invisible to me. I suppose that's my bad, but hopefully I'll keep some other person from doing the same thing. I guarantee I'm not the first this has happened to. I really hate to give bad reviews, but I like my sleep too much to let this slip by as I've often done.  I gave 3 stars for taste and ease of swallowing because I'm neutral on those. Those were average.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: On the new product/ new look there is no expiration date or lot number. See difference in pictures attached.The old product label used to indicate clearly that this made here in USA.NOT ANYMORE. Probably made in China now.Also the tablets do not taste good anymore and they don't melt easily.Therefore, I will stop using this brand/ product.
ReviewTitle: Not the quality of old product!!!

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I don't have a problem falling asleep but occasionally use melatonin if I wake up at 2 or 3am to get 3 or 4 more hours of sleep.I have used the 5mg gummies of this brand for several years with wonderful results but I had to cut them in quarters for a smaller dose. This is not an easy thing to accomplish!! They are sticky!!So when I saw these 1mg tablets I was excited to order them.Well tried them last night at 2am and never fell asleep and when I finally decided to get up at 5am, I was dizzy and wobbly. Yikes!Back to the 5mg gummies and a sharper knife
ReviewTitle: Made me dizzy and didn't work :(

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: These work very well for that I WOULD rate them a 5.  I like that they are 1mg and I can choose to take 1-3 of them depending on how early I am getting to bed.What I don't like is a deal breaker and why I rated these only  1 star. Most melatonin pills are fairly tiny pills that are tasteless and swallow easily. These are the size and texture of an old fashioned aspirin pill so they get stuck in my throat. They aren't easy to swallow. They start to melt in your mouth before you can swallow them and then they stick on the way down the throat no matter how much liquid I am taking them with. Because of this I have to swallow them one at a time or I literally gag and choke on one of them and have to cough it out of my throat. Which is scary! It isn't a nice pill to take before going to bed.I tried dissolving one under my tongue but that was nasty. They aren't tasteless and they are an icky texture (exactly like the old aspirine pills). They aren't smooth, so it is a chore to take them. I am going to look around for another brand to try. I was taking melatonin every night before I bought these, now I have to really think about whether I am up for the ordeal of swallowing them.
ReviewTitle: They get caught in my throat everytime

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply

An hour of tossing and turning. It’s so worthless, I had to take a special trip to Walgreens late at night. Got some melatonin from Walgreens, works as good as Carlyle.We wasted needed sleep time testing this product.
ReviewTitle: I’m Skeptical That This Product Even Contains Melatonin.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: My 9year old son struggles with turning his brain off to fall asleep and the doc recommended melatonin for him. Other low dose brands of melatonin have worked well for him but we thought we’d try this one bc it is so much cheaper. This brand helped him fall asleep, but without fail, every time we used it he would wake up in the middle of the night and be up for hours, unable to fall back asleep! It almost seemed to give him insomnia! He’d fall asleep fine at the beginning of the night, but then wake for 3-5 hours afterward! His sleep returned to normal as soon as we stopped this brand of melatonin.My hubs tried it one night and he said it made him feel weird, as well.I do NOT recommend this brand of melatonin.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply

My 3 year didn’t complain of any sides effects but was knocked out about 90 minutes after I gave it to her.The taste is off too, it doesn’t taste like strawberry but more like chalk.I will not be using it any longer, and will be switching back to my other brand m. ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I took 1 pill for 2 weeks and it was like heaven...I slept  profoundly every night and was even waking up in a good mood. So after 2 weeks, I quit taking it and it was like hell...long sleepless nights, I couldn't get to sleep. It was the worst insomnia...my body was craving melatonin.Had to look for something else to help me with this horrible insomnia caused by quitting melatonin. I started taking sublingual 5htp and seemed to work really well but the side effect of loosing a lot of hair is a deal breaker for me.After 2 months of this, my body seems to have stopped craving the melatonin and can somehow sleep again.I don't recommend it, it's a hormone that the body should produce not take it directly. Just my humble opinion.

ReviewContent: These worked great for me for sleep... BUT they have dextrose, which is sugar, in them. I just got back from the dentist and I have 3 serious cavities which need fillings sooner rather than later, as well as 2 less-urgent cavities that maybe I can reverse with expensive toothpaste. I take *meticulous* care of my teeth and have a healthy diet and have only ever had a cavity here or there in my nearly fifty years of going to the dentist.Why they would put sugar into a product you're going to take right before you go to bed, so that the sugar has time to sit and dissolve upon your teeth, makes no rational sense to me, and I'm angry about it. My fault, I guess, for not reading the ingredient list, but honestly I don't know if I would have twigged to "dextrose" as another name for sugar if some other reviewer on here hadn't pointed it out. So kudos and thanks to that person.My dentist said this theory made sense in looking at my teeth since the only surfaces that showed decay were the back bottom teeth and only on the tops of those teeth - consistent with something you're going to dissolve in your mouth and let sit.So if I can warn someone else away before they ruin THEIR teeth, I figure I'm doing my good deed for the day. Thank you for reading. /rant
ReviewTitle: These have dextrose in them & will ruin your teeth

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I see that this is recommended for adults yet many of the reviews say they give it to their children to help them sleep. The product tastes great and a 1 mg, one pill might work on a child, but it is not effective for me. I was using a different product, a fermented, liquid melatonin of 8 mg per dropper, and obviously I need more than 1 mg for it to be effective, because the liquid worked much better than this. ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I'm 40, but have been dealing with sleep problems since I was about 14.  I have a sleep disorder that means I struggle...a lot...with sleep.  I've done multiple sleep studies, tried numerous RX sleep aids, OTC sleep aids, OTC antihistamines, RX antihistamines, muscle relaxants, beta blockers, alcohol, CBD, using RX stimulants in the morning...working with multiple therapists...walking my clock forward, walking my clock backward, strictly maintaining my sleep schedule, using sleep deprivation to try and reset my circadian rhythms (under the guidance of a sleep doctor), using bright light therapy, restricting blue light sources after 5pm, restricting ALL light sources after 5pm, using exercise and using meditation over the last 20+ years in various combinations to try and correct this problem.  Compounding the situation is the fact that I sleep walk and sleep talk somewhat frequently.  Sleeping is the bane of my existence.  If someone told me they could wave a magic wand and give me 10 million dollars or fix my sleep issues, I would chose sleep over money.I've tried using melatonin in the past, but the sleep doctors at the time had me taking a larger dose (about 10mg) 60-90min before lights out.  They have also had me try using time release melatonin - all to no avail.  In fact the larger the dose of melatonin the WORSE my sleep usually got.Back in January 2023 I started seeing a new sleep specialist.  He put me on a different combination of RXs, but on top of that, he asked me to use a very SMALL dose of melatonin (0.5 to 1.0mg) roughly 5 hours before bed.  Over time, we've been walking back the time I take the melatonin by 15min every 1-2 weeks.  For the first time EVER, I've gone 4.5 months with just 1 sleep walking episode, no car accidents, no oversleeping...just NORMAL sleep!!!  Some of this is because of his guidance, but a LOT of it is due to this product.  Everything else that I'm taking (the RX sleep meds) are things I've taken with very limited success in the past.Taste wise, this is a pretty delicious chewable strawberry flavored tablet.  It's a little more tart than sweet.  The consistency is reasonable and fairly soft.  The taste is good enough that a number of times I've been tempted to have more than one - just because they ARE that tasty and enjoyable!So you combine a product that is VERY affordable, tastes really good, has a tolerable consistency AND WORKS WELL - there literally is no downside to this melatonin supplement.  My advice is just to stick to the small dose size, take it 5-6 hours before you want to be asleep and give it a few weeks of consistent use to see if it works for you, too.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I have suffered for over ten years from insomnia. Due to having an anxiety disorder and major depression and naturally being a night owl addicted to her screens I have HORRIBLE sleeping schedules. So bad that if I cant sleep by 4am I sometimes skip school because the lack of sleep makes me super irritated and shakey etc. (I have no sleeping disorder).So I hear about Melatonin and how it isnt habit forming at all and when I checked Amazon I was hyped that it came strawberry flavored! (Strawberry flavored anything is fabulous). I bought the 1MG to test how much I needed to get me to sleep. I did research and technically anything over 1MG is overdosing and you shouldnt do that but I have severe relaxing issues so I needed this.One thing I will say off the bat is that I thought at first this gave me nightmares the first few nights. But after weening off of it (just in case) I realized it was just lil old me. Now I started off taking it all at once if I took more pills not realizing you should slowly take them. Please slowly take them itll be better for you (an hour before you sleep then if needed when you are trying etc depends on person). My body reacted better when I would slowly take them every hour as opposed to all at once. It made me more groggy.Even though this helps me sleep at a determined time it did not help my quality. I sometimes wake up in the middle of the night to pee or for whatever random factors and this does not keep you knocked out. But even though I have a hard time falling asleep always, when I did wake up, I did not stay up. I can also tell if Ive hit my bodies limit with melatonin because I will wake up groggy. (Thats why you get 1MG to test out your personal limit). At 3MG I got super groggy in the morning but anything lower made me feel normal waking up. I only take this when I need to jump start my sleep cycle again if its out of wack (due to staying up late) and usually itll keep my sleep schedule on track. Ive actually used this on and off for about 2 months and I wake up around the same time now. (AND I NEVER DO or never wake up before 10 without feeling like a swamp monster).I am not doctor and I did not get paid for this review. But I do suggest using it wisely and only occasionally. If you use it frequently your body gets used to how much is in your body and its less effective. I took it 4-6 days straight and realized it was less efficient if I took it too often and frequent. When taken it feels like you are a tad bit dizzy but relaxed. It feels like that awesome sweet spot when you are about to fall asleep and your body is fully relaxed. I would suggest taking these and being prepared for that feeling. It does not make me feel light headed so if you start to feel sleepy you still have time to get to the bedroom and get comfy.Overal I LOVED these chewables. Super delicious and convenient for a college student who needs to wake up for those early morning classes. This did not affect me negatively emotionally or any of my disorders and I did not have side effects except for the occasional groggy feeling. I am not on any other medications so I do not know if it will have adverse reactions if you are on any meds. Good luck!

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I'm an autistic adult that is sensitive to medication, who needs low-dose melatonin to sleep properly at night. I previously reviewed Natrol's gummies for children, and found the Natrol Kids Sleep+Calm (0.5 mg) works well and tastes good in strawberry, and the Natrol Kids Sleep gummy (1mg) works well and tastes only okay in berry. I decided to try these 1mg tablets since they're a far better bang for your buck.Unfortunately those sensitivities cropped up in the 1mg tablet formulation, unlike with the gummies. Perhaps something to do with how quickly the melatonin enters/lingers in your system? I could feel my body and especially my shoulders ache for some reason, and the next day I stayed extremely tired. I slept well, but too well, I didn't want to go in to work the next day, and it wasn't a comfortable sleep. But note that my reaction is very exaggerated and only found in someone with sensitivities, such as with autism, so I wouldn't expect this to happen to most people including young children. I would personally recommend if your child is neurodivergent to give them the Natrol gummies.That said, this tablet is easy to swallow with water and tastes sweet.I want to note the listing currently advertises "Strengthen Immune System" in the title, but on the bottle it says "Consult your healthcare professional before using if you have an autoimmune disorder." The bottle makes it seem as if autoimmune disorders disqualify you from being able to take melatonin safely; a quick google will show similar sentiment, but this is misleading. Melatonin has both pro-inflammatory and anti-inflammatory properties, but it heavily weighs in anti-inflammatory's favor, and is recommended for many patients with inflammation. It is thought to assist in protection against pathogens and can reduce dysfunctional inflammation in overactive immune systems as seen in autoimmune dysregulation.

ReviewContent: I recently tried Natrol Melatonin 1mg, the strawberry-flavored dietary supplement, and it has been a game-changer for my sleep routine. With 200 fast-dissolve tablets in one bottle, this product provides a whopping 200-day supply, making it incredibly cost-effective.The strawberry flavor is a pleasant surprise, making it easy and enjoyable to take. ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I ascribe to a less is more philosophy. This melatonin supplement I have bought multiple times for my family agrees with that philosophy. There is no need to take 3 mg or 5 mg of melatonin until you know that 1 mg will not work for you. Importantly, it is inefficient to take 3 or 5 mg of regular melatonin, which will wear of quickly, in lieu of taking an extended release form. The extended release aspect is very important for staying asleep and not having rebound waking at 3 AM.PROS:- extended release formulation (this brand also makes extended release 3 mg)- easy to swallow tablet- amazing value for the number of tablets you get- great for international travel across multiple time zones (we have taken this to transition to Hawaiian, European, and Australian time zones, and it has worked super well without a hangover feeling in the morning)CONS:- you cannot break an extended release tablet, or it destroys that property; for this reason, 0.5 mg is not an option. It's all in or nothing- it contains magnesium stearate (common in many supplements), which may irritate the gut; I deducted one star for thisAll bottles of melatonin explain that it is meant to be used on a temporary basis only (i.e., several days). This is because research shows that if you continually supplement with melatonin, you run the risk of actually lowering your own *natural* production of melatonin. That's why some people find that it works really well at first but then stops working - or actually makes their sleep cycle more disrupted. The general exceptions to this rule are individuals who are known to produce inadequate amounts of melatonin on their own. For example, the elderly, as well as autistic individuals, tend to be somewhat deficient in melatonin. My other word of advice is ... please remember that melatonin (although a natural supplement) is a hormone that crosses into the brain. Be sure to consult your doctor on how to use it appropriately.This extended release melatonin works really well for my family when we need it - way better than regular release melatonin. I highly recommend it.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: Prescribed to assist with 'getting sleepier earlier' as stress, life, etc., tend to keep the mind active and challenging to let go by day's end. It is by no means an Ambien in which the body builds resistance or tolerance to when taken regularly, thus requiring staged increases in dosage. This was a natural alternative to something the body needs anyway, especially if your regular nighttime meds quit bringing on the drowsiness.I love the flavor  (a smooth strawberry), the quick dissolve (no granules, it dissolves to nothing), and the idea of regulating hormonal activity (perio, or full menopause) and still being able to get up in the a.m. (no hangover). The effect varies, night to night. Some nights I found a strange euphoria, others a surge of energy. Those are difficult to deny, but on to bed we must try. Then strangely, other nights a calmness, ready to sleep feeling comes over me. The key is to let it work, because it does seem to do the job. No middle of the night waking has occurred, and on the nights I skipped, I noticed the lack of it.At 1mg, the effect seems sufficient, even though the doctor suggested moving up 1mg per week (to a maximum of 5mg) until the desired effect is achieved. I think the 1mg is fine as long as you remember that this doesn't make everyone's eyelids droop, but it is working to some degree at a cellular level. I suppose a higher dose may satisfy the desire to get knock-down dead tired, but I already have a terrible time getting out of bed and do not want to make that any more difficult than it does. It does has many health benefits, as do all supplements, but a single magic pill does not exist. Trial and error, practicing good 'bedtime hygiene' and a little motivation to give something new a chance produces good results; better than doing nothing at all.
ReviewTitle: Works in mysterious ways, but it does work

ReviewContent: I bought Natrol 1mg Fast Dissolve Melatonin because I didn't like how groggy I would be the next day when taking an OTC sleep aid with the active ingredient of 25 mg Doxylamine succinate. Even taking 1/2 of that pill would leave me tired the next day. I had read that for some people as little as .3mg of Melatonin (less than half of one of these 1mg pills) works, so I first tried just taking 1/2 a pill.  These pills are not scored (see photo). My first attempt at cutting one with a knife wasn't successful (part of the pill turned to powder) so, since I don't own a pill cutter, I tried just snapping one in half with my fingers and that worked pretty well. For me, half a pill did not work so I moved it up to a whole pill the next night. In the end I found that two pills (2 mg) makes me tired enough that I can easily fall asleep within about 45 minutes and I am not groggy the next day at all! However, I am still waking up in the middle of the night. I looked up all the Natrol versions and discovered they have a time release formula so my next step will be to try that. I plan on buying the 1mg dose so I can start as low as possible and will try pairing with the fast dissolve pills as well since I still have this bottle and you never know... With some time and experimentation I hope to find the right dosage for me.10/14/17 Update : The Natrol 1 mg time release version didn't work for me at all. I tried everything from 1mg to 5 mg and they didn't help me fall asleep or stay asleep. At 5 mg I was actually feeling groggy/off the next day so called it at that point. Then i found out that a lot of us are magnesium deficient, and that magnesium can help you fall asleep, so I started taking 250 mg magnesium oxide with the melatonin and I slept reallly well even on the first night.  I hope you find a combination that works for you.

Her pediatrician suggested melatonin but knowing her complete refusal to take a pill I wondered if I could get her to take it.  These have been perfect.  They don't exactly taste great, but she is willing to chew them up.  Since beginning these chewables, she has been asleep on time almost every night.  I give them to her 1/2 hour before I want her asleep and almost to the minute she calms right down and just snuggles up and goes to sleep.  The added bonus is that this seems to have broken the cycle of her bedtime anxiety since she is not awake in bed stewing over things, she just goes to sleep.ETA: This is a follow up to my previous post.  Since giving these 1mg melatonin chewables to my daughter since April, they are still working fantastically, and she has gotten to the point that she will ask me for them at night if I forget.  Her anxiety is almost completely disappeared, and although there may be other reasons for this I noticed a marked improvement within days of giving her the melatonin.  She is routinely asleep between 8:00-8:30 every night with no fuss.  If you have a child that has trouble settling down to sleep at night, for whatever reason, I would HIGHLY recommend this.  Especially if they have ADHD because it has been shown that kids and adults with ADHD have lower levels of melatonin which tends to contribute to sleep problems.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I really like this brand and formulation of melatonin.  Because it is dissolvable, the effects are felt about 20 minutes after you take it.  This can be faster if you let it absorb under your tongue.  I am a physician, and I wholeheartedly agree with other reviews that say most of the brands on the market are way too high of a dose.  I personally take a quarter or half tablet (0.25-0.5 mg) (they are very easy to break without crumbling) and that works great. The body produces far less than a milligram naturally, and any higher dose is not advised because it can result in a "hangover" effect the next day.  It is also important to remember that melatonin alone is not going to make you fall asleep.  Melatonin is a naturally produced hormone that controls our circadian rhythm - it signals the brain to shift into sleep mode, but does not force the brain to sleep.  As the light outside fades, we naturally start producing melatonin.  This stops when we see light in the morning, allowing our brains to switch back into daytime mode.  It is very useful for mild, occasional insomnia, jet lag or shift work related sleep disorders (where your sleeping schedule is out of sync with your normal circadian rhythm.)  Often times just reducing the amount of light you are exposed to in the hours before sleeping can increase your melatonin production naturally (light from screens in particular suppress the body from making melatonin, as our brain thinks it is a signal that it is still daytime and to stay awake).
ReviewTitle: Great product for appropriate dose of melatonin

ReviewContent: This is a fantastic value! Although you can find a number of pill forms of melatonin at a good price, they take FOREVER to kick in! The fact that this dissolves in your mouth and enters your bloodstream right away makes this a win product for me. I also like that I can split the tablet if need a .5mg . The taste is great as well so you don't have to worry about ending the night on a bitter note. With that said, keep this out of the hands of youngsters...because they DO taste good. Amazon has the best price I've seen thus far for this product and by far the swiftest shipping ( of course).If you are consistently taking 3mg or more, you may find savings by purchasing one of Natrol's other melatonin products, however if you need a lower dose, have never taken melatonin before or need it for a younger individual start here. Upon the advice of our pediatrician we gave a .5mg to our daughter who was having sleep issues for several months. After three days, she was back on track! We plan to only use this with her as needed. It definitely helped our entire family exit an off-schedule slump. Of course, if you are in a similar situation, please discuss appropriate remedies with a pediatrician prior to purchase.These tablets are vegetarian, but in case you have an allergy, they do contain soybeans and real strawberry flavoring.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I switched from taking 3 mg to only taking .5.I actually cut these in half and take only half pill each night. The reason is research shows if you take .5 mg melatonin it triggers your body’s need to make more, if you take more milligrams then your body says it’s got enough and it doesn’t need to produce. I was skeptical that this reduction of melatonin would work on me. I was happy to find it worked! I do have to set a timer an hour before I go to bed to make sure that it’s kicked in before lying down. So .5 triggers a healthy response, 3 mg was actually causing me to have more trouble falling asleep -so it’s better to take less and have it work on your body more healthfully.
ReviewTitle: Happy to learn smaller dosage melatonin is better

Since then I have been using only 1 mg and the results were amazing. I immediately started sleeping better and longer.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I bought Natrol 1mg Fast Dissolve Melatonin because I didn't like how groggy I would be the next day when taking an OTC sleep aid with the active ingredient of 25 mg Doxylamine succinate. Even taking 1/2 of that pill would leave me tired the next day. I had read that for some people as little as .3mg of Melatonin (less than half of one of these 1mg pills) works, so I first tried just taking 1/2 a pill.  These pills are not scored (see photo). My first attempt at cutting one with a knife wasn't successful (part of the pill turned to powder) so, since I don't own a pill cutter, I tried just snapping one in half with my fingers and that worked pretty well. For me, half a pill did not work so I moved it up to a whole pill the next night. In the end I found that two pills (2 mg) makes me tired enough that I can easily fall asleep within about 45 minutes and I am not groggy the next day at all! However, I am still waking up in the middle of the night. I looked up all the Natrol versions and discovered they have a time release formula so my next step will be to try that. I plan on buying the 1mg dose so I can start as low as possible and will try pairing with the fast dissolve pills as well since I still have this bottle and you never know... With some time and experimentation I hope to find the right dosage for me.10/14/17 Update : The Natrol 1 mg time release version didn't work for me at all. I tried everything from 1mg to 5 mg and they didn't help me fall asleep or stay asleep. At 5 mg I was actually feeling groggy/off the next day so called it at that point. Then i found out that a lot of us are magnesium deficient, and that magnesium can help you fall asleep, so I started taking 250 mg magnesium oxide with the melatonin and I slept reallly well even on the first night.  I hope you find a combination that works for you.
ReviewTitle: Works well but I'm still waking up during the night - see update

ReviewContent: I recently tried Natrol Melatonin 1mg, the strawberry-flavored dietary supplement, and it has been a game-changer for my sleep routine. With 200 fast-dissolve tablets in one bottle, this product provides a whopping 200-day supply, making it incredibly cost-effective.The strawberry flavor is a pleasant surprise, making it easy and enjoyable to take. The fast-dissolve feature is convenient, especially for those nights when you just want to get to sleep quickly.As for its effectiveness, I found that taking one 1mg tablet about 30 minutes before bedtime helped me fall asleep faster and experience a more restful sleep. It's a gentle way to ease into sleep without any grogginess the next morning.The fact that it's a dietary supplement rather than a prescription sleep aid is a big plus for me. It feels like a more natural approach to improving sleep quality.In summary, Natrol Melatonin 1mg has become an essential part of my nightly routine. It's affordable, easy to take, and genuinely helps me get the restful sleep I need. If you're looking for a sleep aid, I highly recommend giving it a try.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: After trying out some other melatonin products that were 5-10 mg, I decided to get something lower strength because, while the 5-10 mg were effective in getting me to sleep, they left me groggy (at 10 mg they left me borderline confused the next day). When I discussed that with my dr, here's what he said verbatim: "10 mg is too much melatonin and could play havoc with your immune system and sleep architecture, in some cases permanently. I recommend no more than 5 mg and preferably less than that."  So I ordered these 1 mg chewables and like them a lot. Usually 2 mg is the right dose to take the edge off the day and get me relaxed and a bit sleepy. Sometimes 3 mg, sometimes 1mg. My point being, it's really good to be able to modulate the dose in 1 mg increments, which this 1 mg pill allows. Taste is good, kind of like a fruity candy. All in all, an excellent product I will probably be reordering.

ReviewContent: I've had some ups and downs with these, so I'll just lay out all my experiences in case anyone has the same ones.The first night I tried these, they worked really well. One of the top comments said that combining these with magnesium helps. So I tried that.It worked, but it's still not too easy to fall asleep. I'll try upping the dosage of melatonin and update if there are any changes.One very important thing to note: Last night, I had a weird dream and woke up around 3:30am and I couldn't get back to sleep. It was like, as soon as I woke up, I was up for good. I really don't know much about melatonin and its effect on the waking brain, but I have a feeling it's to blame for this. One of the great things about melatonin is that I get much better quality sleep. But it seems like, if you wake up in the middle of the night, it'll force you to stay awake. Maybe it's just me.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I’ve been using Natorl Melatonin 1mg Chewables for the past 2 years and overall, I’m quite satisfied. Here’s a detailed breakdown:Taste and Texture:The chewables have a pleasant strawberry taste—mildly sweet and not too artificial. The texture is smooth and easy to chew, which makes taking them a bit more enjoyable compared to other melatonin supplements I’ve tried.Effectiveness:These chewables are effective in helping me fall asleep faster and improve the overall quality of my sleep. I take one about 15-20 minutes before bed, and it generally helps me wind down without leaving me groggy in the morning. Personally, 5mg-pill does not help me fall asleep.Dosage:Each chewable contains 1 mg of melatonin. I usually take 2-4 tabs which is a good dose for those needing a mild sleep aid.Price:Here’s where the product falls short for me. The price is on the higher side considering the quantity of pills in the bottle. While the quality and effectiveness are solid, the cost per dose feels a bit steep compared to other options available.Cons:The primary downside is the cost relative to the number of chewables you get. Given the relatively small quantity in each bottle, it might not be the most cost-effective option if you’re using them daily.Overall:I would recommend Natrol Melatonin 1mg for their effectiveness and pleasant taste. Just be aware that they are a bit pricey for the amount you get. If budget isn’t a major concern for you, they’re worth trying for a good night's sleep.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: Didn't realize this had xylitol in it. nevertheless, reminder, DON'T GIVE TO YOUR DOGS xylitol is toxic to dogs.the 1mg actually has 290mg if anyone needs this information.
ReviewTitle: DON'T GIVE TO YOUR DOGS 1MG PILL HAS 290MG XYLITOL

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I have issues with falling asleep, I am an insomniac and I tend to only get a few hours of sleep every few days. I heard from a few people I should try melatonin and went on a search through the internet where I read about different brands and types. I finally settled on these (Natrol 1mg). First night I tried them I took two chewables, I did fall asleep faster then previously but I still only got a couple of hours of sleep and I felt a little more "hung over" than usual.I have never been hung over, since I do not drink but with my normal sleeping habits I wake up with a headache, sometimes nausea and just feel sluggish. After trying the melatonin I felt a bit worse than I normally do and seemed to feel more groggy. I tried the melatonin for about a week first trying a single chewable and going all the way up to 4 chewables, I was not prepared for how I felt after that many chewables. I find myself being able to take less of a dosage with most medications whether otc or prescription so I think I over did it with 4 chewables.The chewables tasted good and I had no funny after taste or anything, to be honest I kinda wish they were a vitamin or candy they tasted so good to me. As with any kind of medication or supplement go into it easy and learn what you can to prepare yourself for what you might be getting into. I didn't have a horrible experience, it was just one that did not work for me and my situation.
ReviewTitle: Taste great but not for someone like me

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: Tried this with our kids when they were a bit hyperactive and wouldn't go to sleep. We can't say if it helped or not because in our trials, with or without taking them their sleep didn't seem to change much.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: Allowing the tablet to just off of my mouth resulted in a very talky taste and feeling. I believe the melatonin aspect works as expected and but do not enjoy letting it dissolve sublingually.
ReviewTitle: Exactly what I was looking for, but too chalky for me to continue use

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: If you're trying it for the first time (or the first time in many years), I would plan around potentially being totally knocked out on the couch the next day.  I didn't realize how bad the side effects can be and was pretty surprised by just how lousy this small dose made me feel.I've been having a lot of trouble sleeping during the pandemic and tried meditation apps, sleepytime tea, an eye mask, soothing music, etc. without success, so I decided it was worth trying melatonin again.  I took it years ago without it having much effect on me (good or bad), so I figured the worst outcome would be that it did nothing. So I was pretty surprised when the melatonin made me extremely drowsy shortly after taking it.  The going to sleep part worked pretty well.  But getting restful sleep?  Not so much!I had very weird, very intense dreams and despite sleeping for 9.5 hours (!) woke up feeling worse than I do after a lousy night's sleep.  Basically, it was like being spectacularly hungover (although fortunately without the other symptoms besides exhaustion and fuzzy-headedness).  I was running a huge sleep deficit though, so when I googled it and learned some people do adjust to melatonin and stop having side effects, it seemed worth tweaking the timing, planning for a long night's sleep, and trying again.  But it just got worse.  By night 3, I ended up going back to bed and sleeping through most of the next day.  I gave up at that point.I have no idea why I'm so sensitive to it now, but I definitely can't take this dose.  I'm reluctant to try again with a lower dose, as this was really pretty unpleasant.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: The produce seems to be fine, but minus 2 stars for no expiration date on the bottle. How old are these pills, Natrol?
ReviewTitle: No expiration date on the bottle

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: Great price! Easy to break tablets in half too. But, I would caution against using for children.I started giving this to my kindergartener, but it would knock him out only to find him wide awake in the middle of the night, sometimes due to nightmares.More importantly: “Earlier this year (2015), sleep researchers at the University of Adelaide in Australia warned doctors and parents not to provide melatonin to kids for sleep problems. In a paper published in the Journal of Paediatrics and Child Health in February, authored by professor David Kennaway, who has studied melatonin for 40 years, Kennaway cautioned that use of the supplement in kids may result in serious side effects when the children are older."The use of melatonin as a drug for the treatment of sleep disorders for children is increasing and this is rather alarming," Kennaway said in a statement. He noted in the paper that there's extensive evidence from animal and human studies that the supplement causes changes in physiological systems, including the reproductive, cardiovascular, immune and metabolic systems. "The word 'safe' is used very freely and loosely with this drug, but there have been no rigorous, long-term safety studies of the use of melatonin to treat sleep disorders in children and adolescents."

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: Please ask your doctor before taking this melatonin its not all natural I had a severe reaction there ER doctor said the melatonin can cause severe bleeding if your on blood thinner and if your on blood pressure medicine it raises your blood pressure high and can have a severe reaction in my case I am on a oxygen machine when I took this melatonin my oxigen dropped way down I couldn't breath even with machine my lips turned blue my pulse rate dropped below normal my blood pressure went way up and a ambulance was called I almost died because of this medicine I'm gonna be here in the hospital for a few days recovering over this please use caution if you purchase this item

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: These worked great for me for sleep... BUT they have dextrose, which is sugar, in them. I just got back from the dentist and I have 3 serious cavities which need fillings sooner rather than later, as well as 2 less-urgent cavities that maybe I can reverse with expensive toothpaste. I take *meticulous* care of my teeth and have a healthy diet and have only ever had a cavity here or there in my nearly fifty years of going to the dentist.Why they would put sugar into a product you're going to take right before you go to bed, so that the sugar has time to sit and dissolve upon your teeth, makes no rational sense to me, and I'm angry about it. My fault, I guess, for not reading the ingredient list, but honestly I don't know if I would have twigged to "dextrose" as another name for sugar if some other reviewer on here hadn't pointed it out. So kudos and thanks to that person.My dentist said this theory made sense in looking at my teeth since the only surfaces that showed decay were the back bottom teeth and only on the tops of those teeth - consistent with something you're going to dissolve in your mouth and let sit.So if I can warn someone else away before they ruin THEIR teeth, I figure I'm doing my good deed for the day. Thank you for reading. /rant
ReviewTitle: These have dextrose in them & will ruin your teeth

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I worry that no long term studies have been done in this drug, but it has worked well for my son.My son (6) throws himself full force into everything he does & as a result has trouble turning his brain off at night. He never complains about bedtime & once in bed, he never gets back up, but he would often roll around in bed for more than 2 hours (we still have a baby monitor on him)  - just running through his day, thinking about …… Minecraft & playing out scenarios in his mind.The 1mg tablet kicked his 34 pound fanny the first night, so night 2, I only gave him half a tablet. Same result, so night 3, I gave him a quarter of a tablet. He settled down just as quickly. It's strange to me that he needs so little, but if I don't give it to him at all, he's up until 11pm.
ReviewTitle: I worry that no long term studies have been done ...

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: Pros: Easy to take, when it works it works wellCons: Doesn't always workI chose to get 1mg tablets because I've read some articles saying that too much melatonin might have an opposite effect. Also, because these are in 1mg tablets, if I need more, it's easier to control my dosage. Sometimes I split the tablet in half and take more if needed. The good thing is, when it works, it works well. I've been able to fall sleep within 15 minutes of taking it. However, it doesn't always work, and sometimes taking additional tablets doesn't do anything. I'm not sure if this is just melatonin in general or if it's specific to this brand.
ReviewTitle: Works fast, but not always effective

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I've taken one pill per evening, for three evenings. Dissolved under tongue.Results: I stopped taking melatonin.Problems: Alarming spiking heart rate for about five minutes, within hour of ingesting. It went back down, but not to normal levels. My HR during sleep was slightly elevated as well.My pulse ox monitor showed reduced oxygen levels during sleep, into sub-optimal levels.If you google diligently, you will find both side-effects are listed for melatonin use in certain individuals.Melatonin is a hormone, and it is not harmful.In many patients, it's well tolerated. In many others, it can cause harms. And that's with only ONE mg.
ReviewTitle: Fast Dissolve Tablets 1mg - spiked heart rate and lowered oxygen levels during sleep

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: Have used this brand for a number of years and have found melatonin a good sleep aid.  This product is well priced and  easy to take.  Why the 3?  Have found the active level to be very inconsistent from bottle to bottle.  Have also found as has been well documented that taking to much can have side effects such as dizziness at night.  Be conscious of this with this product and adjust accordingly.  With the current 1 mg bottles I have, I actually split one  in two

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I initially purchased the 1 mg and the 3 mg versions of this product. Both versions contain 10 mg of B6.I first tried the 1 mg for two nights and my insomnia got worse!?!? I suspected it might be the B6 because I know that B vitamins in general can be energizing for the brain - so the next night I took 1/4 of a 3 mg pill instead, which gave me 0.75 mg of melatonin and reduced the B6 to only 2.5 mg vs the original 10 mg.That night I did much better - it was definitely the B6 - but I also woke up with a groggy feeling like I had a ‘melatonin hangover’ - as if I had been drugged or something,In the end I gave up on melatonin and began practicing strict sleep hygiene which consisted of:Not using my iphone after 7 PMDoing my treadmill an hour earlier (at 7 PM vs 8 PM)Eating a smaller dinner earlierDimming the lights in my house during the eveningTurning the brightness down on my TV and watching non-stimulating shows at nightGoing to bed and waking up in the morning at the same time each day to help reset my internal clock (bed at 10 PM and wake at 6 AM)While my sleep is not perfect it is 80% better after taking these measures - without any pills!
ReviewTitle: CAUTION: THE B6 IN THIS MIGHT KEEP YOU AWAKE!!!!

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: They seem to work ok, but the kids kind we were using before, same MG was a better quality sleep. I think they need to improve the flavor, tastes horrible and chalky.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: The pills don’t have a consistent 1 mg effect. Other options are better.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I see that this is recommended for adults yet many of the reviews say they give it to their children to help them sleep. The product tastes great and a 1 mg, one pill might work on a child, but it is not effective for me. I was using a different product, a fermented, liquid melatonin of 8 mg per dropper, and obviously I need more than 1 mg for it to be effective, because the liquid worked much better than this. So 200 pills is more like a month’s supply for me.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: Melatonin usually will put me to sleep if I don't take it too often. I spent a good bit of time going through the choices and liked the price and reviews for this. Last night I took 2, as I most always have in the past. It didn't affect me in ANY way and I didn't get to sleep. Today I looked at the bottle again, wondering if I should try staying awake the rest of the day and taking 3 tonight and finally saw "1 mg"! Why would anyone want ONE milligram? Maybe this is for babies or very young children, but I can't imagine them needing melatonin... TEN Mgs is the dose I've always taken or 12 if the pills are just 3 mgs each. The "1 mg" is in light green on dark purple and is almost invisible to me. I suppose that's my bad, but hopefully I'll keep some other person from doing the same thing. I guarantee I'm not the first this has happened to. I really hate to give bad reviews, but I like my sleep too much to let this slip by as I've often done.  I gave 3 stars for taste and ease of swallowing because I'm neutral on those. Those were average.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: Yes they are chewable and the flavor isn't that bad but if you really want something to help you sleep, don't get the 1mg or even the 5mg bottle, I suggest you go for 10mg+ if you're having trouble to sleep. I take one or even 2 30min before going to sleep (around 9pm), I fall asleep but late at night I keep rolling in my bed and my conscious is working.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: On the new product/ new look there is no expiration date or lot number. See difference in pictures attached.The old product label used to indicate clearly that this made here in USA.NOT ANYMORE. Probably made in China now.Also the tablets do not taste good anymore and they don't melt easily.Therefore, I will stop using this brand/ product.
ReviewTitle: Not the quality of old product!!!

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: I don't have a problem falling asleep but occasionally use melatonin if I wake up at 2 or 3am to get 3 or 4 more hours of sleep.I have used the 5mg gummies of this brand for several years with wonderful results but I had to cut them in quarters for a smaller dose. This is not an easy thing to accomplish!! They are sticky!!So when I saw these 1mg tablets I was excited to order them.Well tried them last night at 2am and never fell asleep and when I finally decided to get up at 5am, I was dizzy and wobbly. Yikes!Back to the 5mg gummies and a sharper knife
ReviewTitle: Made me dizzy and didn't work :(

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: It puts me to sleep within 20 minutes, however I always seem to wake up 4-5 hours after taking this tablet. I figured I’ll double the dosage (2 tablets now) and see if I wake up a few hours later. Negative. I sleep all night long. My full 8 hours I’m used to... BUT.... their IS A BUT !! I find myself waking up with a FAT headache that eventually goes away after taking 2 Tylenol  pills (Yikes) so many pills can’t possibly be good for this liver!! I’ll just stick with the 1 Mila gram but for KIDS I prefer it over this one. No waking up in the middle of the night and no headache. I’m not sure but it could be just the brand. I don’t know.
ReviewTitle: Restless nights/ headache the next morning

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: These work very well for that I WOULD rate them a 5.  I like that they are 1mg and I can choose to take 1-3 of them depending on how early I am getting to bed.What I don't like is a deal breaker and why I rated these only  1 star. Most melatonin pills are fairly tiny pills that are tasteless and swallow easily. These are the size and texture of an old fashioned aspirin pill so they get stuck in my throat. They aren't easy to swallow. They start to melt in your mouth before you can swallow them and then they stick on the way down the throat no matter how much liquid I am taking them with. Because of this I have to swallow them one at a time or I literally gag and choke on one of them and have to cough it out of my throat. Which is scary! It isn't a nice pill to take before going to bed.I tried dissolving one under my tongue but that was nasty. They aren't tasteless and they are an icky texture (exactly like the old aspirine pills). They aren't smooth, so it is a chore to take them. I am going to look around for another brand to try. I was taking melatonin every night before I bought these, now I have to really think about whether I am up for the ordeal of swallowing them.
ReviewTitle: They get caught in my throat everytime

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: Horrible product. My son uses Melatonin every night as has for years. Are typically brand Carlyle, was out of stock. So I gave this brand a shot. Huge mistake. Not only did my son say it tasted terrible, it literally has 0 effect on him. He typically falls asleep within 10 minutes after taking melatonin. With this brand, he can’t sleep at all. An hour of tossing and turning. It’s so worthless, I had to take a special trip to Walgreens late at night. Got some melatonin from Walgreens, works as good as Carlyle.We wasted needed sleep time testing this product.
ReviewTitle: I’m Skeptical That This Product Even Contains Melatonin.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: Contains wheat, even though product specifications clearly state wheat free. Completely unacceptable and dangerous for those who are Celiac. No picture of actual ingredient list on bottle in item photos.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: My toddler seems to tolerate taking it better, but it is not as effective the Zarbees, for whatever reason. This is just straight melatonin, whereas the other contains other ingredients such as chamomile, so maybe that's it? I am not sure. I feel bad that I medicate my kid to sleep. But, without it, he just won't go the eff to sleep. He will literally stay awake until 11, wake up at 6, and then refuse to nap. It's awful.
ReviewTitle: My toddler seems to tolerate taking it better, but it is not as effective the Zarbees

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: Took these a few nights. First night, kept me awake. 2nd night, went to sleep, but woke up about 3 hours later. This trend continued for the week I took them. No longer using them.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: My fault for not reading the package carefully enough before buying, but this has a lot of xylitol which is extremely lethal to dogs. The taste was pretty bad. Kind of a stale strawberry.
ReviewTitle: Xylitol- beware if you have a dog

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: My 9year old son struggles with turning his brain off to fall asleep and the doc recommended melatonin for him. Other low dose brands of melatonin have worked well for him but we thought we’d try this one bc it is so much cheaper. This brand helped him fall asleep, but without fail, every time we used it he would wake up in the middle of the night and be up for hours, unable to fall back asleep! It almost seemed to give him insomnia! He’d fall asleep fine at the beginning of the night, but then wake for 3-5 hours afterward! His sleep returned to normal as soon as we stopped this brand of melatonin.My hubs tried it one night and he said it made him feel weird, as well.I do NOT recommend this brand of melatonin.

ProductTitle: Natrol Fast Dissolve Melatonin 1 mg, Melatonin Supplements for Restful Sleep, Sleep Support for Adults, 200 Strawberry-Flavored Melatonin Tablets, Up to a 200 Day Supply
ReviewContent: It’s nice flavor to eat but it’s not helping me a lot during the late night maybe it depends different people. But u guys can try it!
